content.question: The process shown on the maps had which of the following effects on European politics in the period?

choices.label: It led to a powerful backlash against colonialism among newly enfranchised working-class voters.
It destabilized the governments of many European countries that struggled to meet the costs of their new colonies.
It increased tensions among rival European powers by creating another venue for international competition.
It provided a means for European governments to lessen political radicalism by deporting dissidents to their colonies.

content.answer: It increased tensions among rival European powers by creating another venue for international competition.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
